li.label: soothing breeze
li.description: Something is having a calming affect on me, I'm thinking clearly and I'm wasting less energy fretting about senseless concerns.

li.label: soothing breeze
li.description: Something is having a calming affect on me, I'm thinking clearly and I'm wasting less energy fretting about senseless concerns.

li.label: soothing breeze
li.description: With the wind at my back, I feel calm, relaxed, and focused and have the energy to keep going.

li.label: soothing breeze
li.description: All distractions have been washed away, I am utterly focused and have the confidence to execute all tasks to perfection.

li.label: Glimmer of hope
li.description: I have this glimmer of hope that wasn't there before!

li.label: Ray of hope
li.description: Theres a ray of light breaking through this dark mood, I finally feel like we have a chance.

li.label: Beacon of hope
li.description: All the misfortune that's befallen us is being burned away by a brilliant light, I have a burst of energy and feel amazing!

li.label: pumped
li.description: I feel great. This is better than Go-Juice.

li.label: amped
li.description: This is amazing! I could run like the wind and fight like a lion - nothing can stop me!

li.label: surging energy
li.description: I'm surging with power, I feel unstoppable.

li.label: anxious
li.description: There's a tingling sensation at the back of my neck, like I'm always being watched... it's creepy.

li.label: nervous
li.description: I keep seeing something out of the corner of my eye, it feels like someone is right behind me and it has me on edge.

li.label: distraught
li.description: There's another presence next to me, assisting in everything I do. It knows what to do before I do. Am I possessed?!

li.label: blinded
li.description: There was a flash of light and what it revealed to me... I can't... I don't want to see anymore!
